tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE market_data (
  symbol VARCHAR(50),
  date TIMESTAMP,
  open_price DECIMAL(10,2),
  high_price DECIMAL(10,2),
  low_price DECIMAL(10,2),
  close_price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE historical_market_data (
  id INT,
  symbol VARCHAR(255),
  date DATE,
  open_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  close_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  volume BIGINT
);

CREATE TABLE trend_analysis (
  id INT,
  symbol VARCHAR(255),
  date DATE,
  trend VARCHAR(50),
  sentiment VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE market_data (
    symbol STRING,
    date DATE,
    open DECIMAL,
    high DECIMAL,
    low DECIMAL,
    close DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE MarketData (
    symbol STRING,
    date DATE,
    open DECIMAL,
    high DECIMAL,
    low DECIMAL,
    close DECIMAL,
    volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE historical_prices (
  symbol VARCHAR(10),
  date DATE,
  open_price DECIMAL(10,2),
  close_price DECIMAL(10,2),
  high_price DECIMAL(10,2),
  low_price DECIMAL(10,2)
);
